content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate production facility at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position z1)

### Iron gear wheel crafting station at position(a)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position a1)

### Assembling machine for future production at position(b)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position b1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft without required ingredients
- Ensure that you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. In this case, iron-plate is required for crafting iron-gear-wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
